title: Ep. 505 - Law And Order Is Officially Dead
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, we are told that an armed right wing militia member shot a “protester” who was trying to tear down a statue. But there is a lot more to this story, and it shows how law and order is dead in our country. We’ll talk about that. Also Five Headlines including the Left’s attempts to cancel a man because they don’t like the shirt he wore while fishing. And the Supreme Court magically discovered transgenderism in the Civil Rights Act.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
